answers.answer: Hello,Because this supplement is not evaluated by the FDA I am afraid I cannot offer any information about its safety. As with ALL medications(prescribed or not) there is always a chance of adverse side effects so if you decide to take this supplement please keep a careful watch for anything that seems out of the ordinary(and get checked out if you do).Take care.

question: I am a type 2 diabetic with severe arthritis in my hands.  My friend, who doesn't have diabetes, takes Joint MD for her arthritis and swears by it.  Is it safe for me to use?Thank youLorca30
title: Arthritis
